name: Race Time (itch) (TheSebarooo)
description:
Made for Miz Jam 1

Thanks for checking out my game. It is fairly difficult, and requires a lot of coordination. The coins are unnecessary to collect.

Not explained in the game:

  • Lives are taken away, only if the car hits a block
  • Arrow Keys add to the score, and contribute to the combo
  • Combo increases every 10 correct arrows pressed

Controls:

  • W - Move Car Up
  • A - Move Car Down
  • Up Arrow - Hit the note when the top arrow is inside the other
  • Left Arrow - 2nd top arrow inside
  • Right Arrow - 2nd Bottom arrow
  • Down Arrow - Bottom arrow
